title: The Batman Adventures: The Lost Years
description: Spanning the gap between the animated series The Batman and Robin Adventures and the current Batman: The Gotham Adventures, these stories detail many changes as Dick Grayson quits being Robin to take on the new heroic guise of Nightwing, young Tim Drake becomes the new Robin, and Batgirl becomes a frequent guest in the Batcave.Collecting BATMAN ADEVENTURES: THE LOST YEARS #1-5.
author: Hilary J. Bader
